name: Recycle Yourself!
description:
Hi everyone, this is my Capstone Project: Recycle yourself!

Modifications:

1. Created a script that would start a cutscene

2. Created some form of movement for the camera in the cutscene

3. Added an enemy AI script that would allow it to patrol and chase the player. I have not decided on what it will do once captured so the attack for now is empty.

Created by: Karlo Kalis

Thank you. I hope you enjoy this very basic version of the game.
